description: Try our easy to follow Choc Mallow Salted Caramel Tart recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Choc Mallow Salted Caramel Tart Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200 g solid milk chocolate Easter eggs, unwrapped

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, dip knife blade in boiling water until hot, wipe dry, then slice tart - wipe knife clean, then dip blade into boiling water and wipe dry between cutting slices to prevent marshmallow from sticking.
